Reason
Stake.link (SDL) is a decentralized liquid-staking-as-a-service platform originating from the Chainlink ecosystem. The platform empowers Chainlink (LINK) token holders to participate in Chainlink Staking via stLINK, the LINK LST, enhancing the cryptoeconomic security of oracle services while earning rewards. The platform is governed by the SDL token (SDL) which earns a reward of protocol fees.

Liquidity is on Curve - stLINK/LINK stablepool and we've passed the initial ARFC to get listed on AAVE.

https://www.curve.finance/dex/ethereum/pools/factory-stable-ng-403/swap/
